EmailTemplate.name: IMC TCR
EmailTemplate.subject: TCR for Sales Order {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c}, {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
I have attached the Task Completion Report for the project completed on your system at {!Account.Name}. If you have any questions, please give us a call.
Thank you.
IMC Support Support: 800-987-0911 | www.zuerchertech.com
